Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at MGM Grand Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas (The Strip), you'll be convenient to Crystals at City Center and University of Nevada-Las Vegas. This 4-star resort is within close proximity of The Linq and High Roller.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy body treatments and facials. Gambling sorts can try their luck at the casino, while others may prefer a nightclub or an outdoor pool. Additional amenities include concierge services, gift shops/newsstands, and a hair salon.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's 17 restaurants and 2 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 5 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Planning an event in Las Vegas? This resort has 602,000 square feet (55928 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's 17 restaurants and 2 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 5 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy body treatments and facials. Gambling sorts can try their luck at the casino, while others may prefer a nightclub or an outdoor pool. Additional amenities include concierge services, gift shops/newsstands, and a hair salon.

Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

With a stay at MGM Grand Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas (The Strip), you'll be convenient to Crystals at City Center and University of Nevada-Las Vegas. This 4-star resort is within close proximity of The Linq and High Roller.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Crystals at City Center - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
The Linq - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
High Roller - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
The Auto Collections - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Bali Hai Golf Club - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Welcome to Fabulous Las Vegas Sign - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Sands Expo Convention Center - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Thomas and Mack Center - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Orleans Arena - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
National Atomic Testing Museum - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Desert Research Institute - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
University of Nevada-Las Vegas - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Marjorie Barrick Museum - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Fashion Show Mall - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Town Square Las Vegas - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi

The preferred airport for MGM Grand Hotel & Casino is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for MGM Grand Hotel and Casino is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property’s location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Room No: 1

Please note that upon check-in, photo ID and credit card are required. All special requests are subject to availability at the time of check-in. Special requests cannot be guaranteed and may incur additional charges.,Please note that the authorization amount in addition to room/tax and resort fee/tax for a credit card is as followed:
Standard Room/Suite USD 300 per day
Terrace or Marquee Suite USD 500 per day.,All guestrooms at this property are non-smoking. Guests are responsible for all costs, damages, and liabilities caused by smoking.,This is a strictly non-smoking property. Guests are responsible for all costs, damages, and liabilities caused by smoking.,Parking is available at an additional charge. Kindly contact the property for more details.,In case of early departure, guests will be responsible for the full remaining amount (room rate and tax) of the reservation.,Parking fees
Valet:
0 to 2 hours: USD 16.00
2 - 4 hours: USD 18.00
4 - 24 hours: USD 24.00

Self Park:
0 - 1 hour: Complimentary
1 - 2 hours: USD 9.00
2 - 4 hours: USD 12.00
4 - 24 hours: USD 15.00,For any bookings that are made with 2 complimentary buffets promotion, it excludes dinner and is up to a USD 75 value.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

RoomType.text: Double Stay Well Grand King Room

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 41-50 USD per room perday to be paid directly to the hotel Applicable from 05/Mar/2018 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: A daily resort fee of $37.00 plus applicable tax will be applied to all reservations. The resort fee includes: Property-wide high speed internet access (public spaces and in-room), unlimited local and toll free calls, airline boarding pass printing and notary service. SELF PARKING RATES: The self-parking fee is $9 for vehicles parked over 1 hour to 2 hours and $12 for vehicles parked over 2 to 4 hours and $15 over 24 hours VALET PARKING RATES: The valet parking fee is $16 for the first 2 hours (no grace period), $18 for 2 hours to 4 hours and $24 over 24 hours Early check in is not charged in any of MGM properties, however, based on availability at the property discretion Rooms and suites are non-smoking. If there is evidence of smoking of any substance in your accommodation, you will incur a minimum deep cleaning fee of $500 for rooms and $1,000 for suites and Stay Well rooms charged to your hotel account. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information:
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 41-50 USD per room perday to be paid directly to the hotel Applicable from 05/Mar/2018 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: This hotel charges guests a daily Resort Fee of $32 plus tax per room, per night, payable directly to hotel. SELF PARKING RATES: The self-parking fee is $7 for vehicles parked over 1 hour to 2 hours and $10 for vehicles parked over 2 to 4 hours and $12 over 24 hours VALET PARKING RATES: The valet parking fee is $15 for the first 4 hours (no grace period) and $20 for over 4 hours to 24 hours Early check in is not charged in any of MGM properties, however, based on availability at the property discretion Rooms and suites are non-smoking. If there is evidence of smoking of any substance in your accommodation, you will incur a minimum deep cleaning fee of $500 for rooms and $1,000 for suites and Stay Well rooms charged to your hotel account. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Note: *Pool is open from mid March to mid September yearly.* *Minimum check in age is 21 years old.* *Name changes are prohibited.* *There is a resort fee payable by the guest.* *This hotel has a Maximum 14 night stay restriction.* **At check in all guests will be required to present a Major Credit Card to cover applicable charges for room, tax and resort fees, as well as a incidental amount per day.** *Please be advised there is a fee for early departure.* **Rooms and suites are non-smoking. If there is evidence of smoking of any substance in your accommodation, you will incur a minimum deep cleaning fee of $500 for rooms and $1,000 for suites and Stay Well rooms charged to your hotel account. ***

RESORTFEE Charges: 259.00 USD (Excluded i.e. pay to hotel at the time of check-In)

A minimum mandatory hotel-imposed fee of at least $37.00 (plus applicable tax) per room, per day, will be charged and collected by the hotel at check-in or check-out. This fee is subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees that they may be responsible for but is not a guarantee of the final amount due. For a detailed description of what is included in the mandatory fee, please see hotel policies.

Minimum self-parking fees and valet parking fees are charged by the hour per room, per vehicle. These fees are tiered by hourly increments and collected by the hotel at check in or check out. The fee amounts are subject to change without prior notice. The information published here is to give the client an estimate of additional fees they may be responsible for but not a guarantee of the final amount due.
